<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rope Runner](/Feats.aspx?ID=6380) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 209 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=258)

**Prerequisites**
[Pirate Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6378); Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet, but only when climbing ropes and similar objects. Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374) or an Acrobatics check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369), you get a critical success instead. You aren't [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) while Climbing or [Balancing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) on a rope or similar object.
name: Rope Runner
prerequisite: Pirate Dedication; Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics
